related.meaning: seni dan sains, ilmu pengetahuan liberal

idioms.meaning: lacking the talent to do anything but eat
a jack of all trades is a master of none

idioms.word: 芸術は長く人生は短し
idioms.reading: げいじゅつはながくじんせいはみじかし
idioms.meaning: art is long, life is short

idioms.word: 芸が身を助けるほどの不幸せ
idioms.reading: げいがみをたすけるほどのふしあわせ
idioms.meaning: being able to live as an artist is no blessing

lessons.japanese: 私は芸術家ではない。全然向いていない。
lessons.indonesian: I am not an artist. I never had the knack for it.

lessons.japanese: 彼女の庭は芸術作品です。
lessons.indonesian: Her garden is a work of art.

lessons.japanese: 私は芸術家ではない。全然向いていない。
lessons.indonesian: I am not an artist. I never had the knack for it.

lessons.japanese: 空想はしばしば芸術の母になる。
lessons.indonesian: Fantasy is often the mother of art.

lessons.japanese: 去年手芸コースを取っていたのです。
lessons.indonesian: I took an art class last year.

lessons.japanese: 私たちは誰でも、多かれ少なかれ芸術に興味を持っている。
lessons.indonesian: Every one of us is more or less interested in art.

lessons.japanese: 我々は誰でも芸術には多かれ少なかれ興味を抱いている。
lessons.indonesian: Every one of us is more or less interested in art.

lessons.japanese: 歌舞伎は古くからの日本の芸術だ。
lessons.indonesian: Kabuki is an old Japanese art.

lessons.japanese: 科学と芸術は人類の幸福の増進に貢献しなければならない。
lessons.indonesian: Science and art must contribute to the promotion of human welfare.
A jack of all trades is a master of none.

lessons.japanese: 猿はたくさん芸を覚える。
lessons.indonesian: Monkeys can learn a lot of tricks.

lessons.japanese: 園芸がここ数年、流行しています。
lessons.indonesian: Gardening has been popular for some years.

lessons.japanese: 一芸に長じることが大切だ。
lessons.indonesian: It is important to be accomplished in some art.

lessons.japanese: われわれの芸術上の好みは一致する。
モネの芸術は印象派を代表している。
lessons.indonesian: Monet's art is representative of Impressionism.
